comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: These days are gone forever.  You can't get a group out front like that anymore.  Well, maybe congress people.

comment.author: 29350288@N06
comment._content: Event: Marriage of the President's daughter. 25 November 1913.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: White House wedding of the President's daughter, Jessie Woodrow Wilson, to Francis Bowes Sayre.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
